plot: As Adolf Hitler personally flies a bomber on a mission to the Soviet Union, the gremlins from the Kremlin set about to stop him.
title: Russian Rhapsody

plot_en: As Adolf Hitler personally flies a bomber on a mission to the Soviet Union, the gremlins from the Kremlin set about to stop him.

cast.role: Adolf Hitler /              Gremlin from the Kremlin
